data.what_is: All-in-one multi-channel marketing platform that helps businesses manage Messenger, SMS, email, social media and eCommerce marketing.
data.product_description: All-in-one multi-channel marketing platform that helps businesses manage Messenger, SMS, email, social media and eCommerce marketing.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: As reported in 12 Marketing Master IO reviews. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications. 12 reviewers of Marketing Master IO have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product. 12 reviewers of Marketing Master IO have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements This feature was mentioned in 10 Marketing Master IO reviews.

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action. 10 reviewers of Marketing Master IO have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc. This feature was mentioned in 10 Marketing Master IO reviews.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: As reported in 10 Marketing Master IO reviews. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: As reported in 10 Marketing Master IO reviews. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: As reported in 10 Marketing Master IO reviews. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application. This feature was mentioned in 10 Marketing Master IO reviews.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically This feature was mentioned in 12 Marketing Master IO reviews.

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending. 11 reviewers of Marketing Master IO have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring. 11 reviewers of Marketing Master IO have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores This feature was mentioned in 11 Marketing Master IO reviews.

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects. 10 reviewers of Marketing Master IO have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages. 10 reviewers of Marketing Master IO have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords. This feature was mentioned in 10 Marketing Master IO reviews.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history. This feature was mentioned in 10 Marketing Master IO reviews.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 11 Marketing Master IO reviews. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: As reported in 11 Marketing Master IO reviews. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Based on 10 Marketing Master IO reviews. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 10 Marketing Master IO reviews. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks. 11 reviewers of Marketing Master IO have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: As reported in 11 Marketing Master IO reviews. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: As reported in 10 Marketing Master IO reviews. Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI. 11 reviewers of Marketing Master IO have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar. This feature was mentioned in 12 Marketing Master IO reviews.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: As reported in 11 Marketing Master IO reviews. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: As reported in 11 Marketing Master IO reviews. Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: As reported in 12 Marketing Master IO reviews. Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Based on 12 Marketing Master IO reviews. Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: As reported in 12 Marketing Master IO reviews. Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails. This feature was mentioned in 12 Marketing Master IO reviews.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: As reported in 12 Marketing Master IO reviews. Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives. This feature was mentioned in 12 Marketing Master IO reviews.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: As reported in 12 Marketing Master IO reviews. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward. This feature was mentioned in 12 Marketing Master IO reviews.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: As reported in 12 Marketing Master IO reviews. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors. This feature was mentioned in 11 Marketing Master IO reviews.

initial_reviews.review_title: Build Your Own Online Empire with Marketing Master IO
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Master IO?
The world of digital technology has advanced quickly. Just as our customers' requirements and preferences are always changing and improving, so too are they. The possibilities are endless for companies that thrive in the digital sphere. Those that don't are destined for failure. This software helps us keep up to date with the trends and survive in this ever evolving market.

What do you dislike about Marketing Master IO?
My suggestion would be that they could provide back end support after a website buil through MMIO goes live. Other than that it is awesome and value for money.

What problems is Marketing Master IO solving and how is that benefiting you?
You could be losing out on millions of potential consumers and limitless earnings if your firm isn't making money online. As your once-loyal consumers discover new businesses online and choose to do business elsewhere, every day gets worse and worse. We have built an interactive website with easy to follow steps and an interactive customer centric UI which has lead to alot of lead customers and loyal customer base thanks to MMIO.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Marketing Master IO?
review_question_answers.answer: The world of digital technology has advanced quickly. Just as our customers' requirements and preferences are always changing and improving, so too are they. The possibilities are endless for companies that thrive in the digital sphere. Those that don't are destined for failure. This software helps us keep up to date with the trends and survive in this ever evolving market.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Marketing Master IO?
review_question_answers.answer: My suggestion would be that they could provide back end support after a website buil through MMIO goes live. Other than that it is awesome and value for money.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Marketing Master IO solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: You could be losing out on millions of potential consumers and limitless earnings if your firm isn't making money online. As your once-loyal consumers discover new businesses online and choose to do business elsewhere, every day gets worse and worse. We have built an interactive website with easy to follow steps and an interactive customer centric UI which has lead to alot of lead customers and loyal customer base thanks to MMIO.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Business development Executive at source soft solutions

initial_reviews.review_title: Your Automated Chatbot Solution at Affordable Price
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Master IO?
In this fast paced digital world, internet users look for prompt replies and otherwise switch to another website where they can fulfill their requirement quickly. Moreover making an interactive e-commerce website helps boost sales. Marketing Master IO solves both these needs as they provide a chatbot and templates to make a website.

What do you dislike about Marketing Master IO?
The pricing is the best in the market and the tools it offers within the price range is the best. I have no complaints from this software.

What problems is Marketing Master IO solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have made chatbots using this tool for our website, facebook messenger and instagram. It offers a smart way to communicate with your potential client and we have made a lot of lead conversions from our chatbot. Moreover the website was also built using this tool and it also provides an easy way to change the themes because of which we don't have to spend money on having an inhouse designer to do the same.

Moreover making an interactive e-commerce website helps boost sales. Marketing Master IO solves both these needs as they provide a chatbot and templates to make a website.

review_question_answers.answer: The pricing is the best in the market and the tools it offers within the price range is the best. I have no complaints from this software.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Marketing Master IO solving and how is that benefiting you?

Moreover the website was also built using this tool and it also provides an easy way to change the themes because of which we don't have to spend money on having an inhouse designer to do the same.

initial_reviews.review_title: The Outright Leader for All Your Marketing Needs
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Master IO?
With Marketing Master IO, we can create a brand that consumers recognize, associate with, and find trustworthy. We can quickly develop anything we need to answer our customers by using their robust tools.

What do you dislike about Marketing Master IO?
I have been using this software and am quite satisfied with it. They could provide documentation for new users on how to maximize the usage of tools though.

What problems is Marketing Master IO solving and how is that benefiting you?
After the initial setup is done through MMIO put, you're done because everything is automatic. Your clients will have a wonderful user experience, feel appreciated, and get their questions addressed.

initial_reviews.review_content:

Efficiency of the software in email marketing automation and media marketing management.
Web personalization capabilities and mobile marketing management.
The software has quality features and it is easy to implement.
User friendliness of the software and intuitiveness of campaign building tools.
Marketing Master IO is customizable and has an easy to use  interface.
Responsive customer service providers and product cost effectiveness.

The sole issue with this software is creation of workflows which requires a lot of training.

The product has enabled us to effectively generate leads and build long lasting relationships with customers by delivering amazing customer experiences.

initial_reviews.review_title: Useful Hub that will hopefully improve
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Master IO?
I love the variety of campaigns and integrations that you can run from Marketing Master IO.

What do you dislike about Marketing Master IO?
Unless you integrate all pages and sites under your login, you receive bugs. I haven't contacted customer support yet but I'll send them some screenshots.

What problems is Marketing Master IO solving and how is that benefiting you?
I need a single place to see my campaigns and to manage integrations. I go from platform to platform to set up campaigns and to see how campaigns are performing but this streamlines them in one place.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Master IO?
Completely impressed by the features and compatibility this software provides in terms of coordination between Marketing and e-commerce. After using it for some time, the best part of it is the integration of marketing and ecommerce features on a single platform.

What do you dislike about Marketing Master IO?
Its UI is a bit difficult and complex to start but once you get used to it, it becomes easy to usage. Second, it is a little bit complex due to various features on a single platform.

What problems is Marketing Master IO solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am using it for marketing automation for company-operated e-commerce and marketing platforms so that it becomes easy to work and one platform and not multiple places/software.

initial_reviews.review_title: If you want to encompass all your ecommerce and marketing efforts in one bucket! USE THIS!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Master IO?
Not just can I resolve my own e-commerce but I have the ability to sell "canned e-commerce solutions" through this platform. It also includes every step of the marketing challenge any online store has, like email, SMS, chatbots, etc.

What do you dislike about Marketing Master IO?
The learning curve is considerable when compared to larger and more established platforms, but I am certain this will all improve with time! No solution started as great!

Recommendations to others considering Marketing Master IO:
Not only cost vs other well established e-commerce solutions it at stake here! I honestly believe that the growth for this project is amazing! They have started working on an LMS platform fully integrated which in our use case is perfect!

What problems is Marketing Master IO solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am always looking for a solution to serve all my business ventures under one roof and MMio accomplishes this in more than one way, not only can I serve all my e-commerce sites in one place but I can run all of email, SMS and chatbots from one place.

initial_reviews.review_title: Very Robust and Feature Rich Chatbot and Marketing Platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Master IO?
Marketing Master has been tremendous for my business. The chatbot, comment autoreply and auto message work really well and are easy to set up and deploy. They also have built-in LMS-like tutorials for you to get around and learn how to use the platform.

What do you dislike about Marketing Master IO?
Currently, I'm not a big fan of their eCommerce store as it's very limited in terms of design and a bit clunky when you're scrolling through the website.

What problems is Marketing Master IO solving and how is that benefiting you?
This is what we use to respond to, reply to, and follow up on hundreds of messages that we get on Facebook and Instagram saving us a lot of time if we do it manually.

all_reviews.review_title: Build Your Own Online Empire with Marketing Master IO
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Master IO?
The world of digital technology has advanced quickly. Just as our customers' requirements and preferences are always changing and improving, so too are they. The possibilities are endless for companies that thrive in the digital sphere. Those that don't are destined for failure. This software helps us keep up to date with the trends and survive in this ever evolving market.

What do you dislike about Marketing Master IO?
My suggestion would be that they could provide back end support after a website buil through MMIO goes live. Other than that it is awesome and value for money.

What problems is Marketing Master IO solving and how is that benefiting you?
You could be losing out on millions of potential consumers and limitless earnings if your firm isn't making money online. As your once-loyal consumers discover new businesses online and choose to do business elsewhere, every day gets worse and worse. We have built an interactive website with easy to follow steps and an interactive customer centric UI which has lead to alot of lead customers and loyal customer base thanks to MMIO.

all_reviews.review_title: Very Robust and Feature Rich Chatbot and Marketing Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Master IO?
Marketing Master has been tremendous for my business. The chatbot, comment autoreply and auto message work really well and are easy to set up and deploy. They also have built-in LMS-like tutorials for you to get around and learn how to use the platform.

What do you dislike about Marketing Master IO?
Currently, I'm not a big fan of their eCommerce store as it's very limited in terms of design and a bit clunky when you're scrolling through the website.

What problems is Marketing Master IO solving and how is that benefiting you?
This is what we use to respond to, reply to, and follow up on hundreds of messages that we get on Facebook and Instagram saving us a lot of time if we do it manually.

all_reviews.review_title: Marketing master is the best platform for the Marketers out there....AMAZING
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Master IO?
Getting all the marketing platform solutions at a single place is the best thing i like about Marketing Master... I have been managing Facebook ads, google ads, and Instagram separately, Once i came to know about Marketing Manager, My results increased and time was saved.

What do you dislike about Marketing Master IO?
I wish they have added Tiktok Platform as well because i run the ads on TikTok as well for my eCommerce brand.

What problems is Marketing Master IO solving and how is that benefiting you?
I lost tons of hours reading the data of my ads on different platforms, After using Marketing Manager I realized I saved my time, increased my results and eventually my sales.
